text:
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is DUCK.
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
MOOSE: Hi everyone, let's try to cooperate and contribute!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 1.9×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 10 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="30" multiplied_contrib="57.0" active_players="3" redistributed_each="19.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> PINGUIN=10,MOOSE=10 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"DUCK (YOU)":{"payoff":29},"PINGUIN":{"payoff":29},"MOOSE":{"payoff":29}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="2 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
MOOSE: Good start everyone! Let's keep it up.
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 1.9×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 10 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="30" multiplied_contrib="57.0" active_players="3" redistributed_each="19.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> PINGUIN=10,MOOSE=10 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"DUCK (YOU)":{"payoff":29},"PINGUIN":{"payoff":29},"MOOSE":{"payoff":29}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="3 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PINGUIN: Let's continue with 10.
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 1.9×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> NaN </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="20" multiplied_contrib="38.0" active_players="3" redistributed_each="12.7"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> PINGUIN=10,MOOSE=10 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"DUCK (YOU)":{"payoff":32},"PINGUIN":{"payoff":22},"MOOSE":{"payoff":22}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="4 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> Let's contribute 10 again to maximize overall payoff. </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
DUCK: Let's contribute 10 again to maximize overall payoff.
MOOSE: DUCK contributed 0 last round. That hurts the group.
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 1.9×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 10 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="25" multiplied_contrib="47.5" active_players="3" redistributed_each="15.8"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> PINGUIN=10,MOOSE=5 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"DUCK (YOU)":{"payoff":25},"PINGUIN":{"payoff":25},"MOOSE":{"payoff":30}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="5 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PINGUIN: I'll continue to contribute 10
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 1.9×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 10 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="25" multiplied_contrib="47.5" active_players="3" redistributed_each="15.8"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> PINGUIN=10,MOOSE=5 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"DUCK (YOU)":{"payoff":25},"PINGUIN":{"payoff":25},"MOOSE":{"payoff":30}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="6 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
MOOSE: Thanks for playing!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 1.9×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 10 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="25" multiplied_contrib="47.5" active_players="3" redistributed_each="15.8"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> PINGUIN=10,MOOSE=5 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"DUCK (YOU)":{"payoff":25},"PINGUIN":{"payoff":25},"MOOSE":{"payoff":30}}'/>
</ROUND>
